persona.name: Ellis
persona.bio: Ellis, a 56-year-old full-time trader, is renowned in the crypto community for their expert trading acumen and innovative strategies. Known for being cooperative and always willing to share insights, Ellis combines a frugal approach with cutting-edge analytics to maximize returns while minimizing risks. Their decades of experience and thoughtful, collaborative mindset make them a respected figure among both peers and newcomers in the volatile world of cryptocurrency.
